job_purpose: Join Cotality's Australian team as a Software Engineer to enhance the market-leading SaaS solution, Prime Ecosystem, and support clients globally.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design, develop, implement, and maintain Cotality's online products and services
Identify and recommend new technologies and improvements
Contribute to the systems, databases, infrastructure, code, and documentation
Maximize performance and availability of products and services
Liaise with clients, partners, and internal staff
Develop and support online products for quality user experiences
Undertake application monitoring and operations support
required_qualifications: More than 2 years' experience in a similar role
High proficiency in PHP, Typescript, JavaScript, REST API
High proficiency in Angular, Laravel framework, NodeJS
Good proficiency in MySQL, command line/terminal
Ability to see things from the user's point of view
preferred_qualifications: Command line experience, preferably with shell-scripting abilities
Desire to continually improve code quality
company_details: Cotality is a trusted source for property intelligence, driving the largest asset class globally. The company values diversity, innovation, collaboration, and client-centricity, offering a supportive work culture with opportunities for professional growth and development.
